Lets your [[agent]] detect if there is a collidable block in the specified direction.

==Syntax==

: <code>detect <direction: string></code>

==Arguments==

<code>direction: string</code>
: Specifies the direction of Agent to detect a collidable block.
: Must be one of:
:* <code>forward</code> to detect the block on the front.
:* <code>back</code> to detect the block on the back.
:* <code>left</code> to detect the block on the left-hand side.
:* <code>right</code> to detect the block on the right-hand side.
:* <code>up</code> to detect the block on the top side.
:* <code>down</code> to detect the block on the bottom side.

==Result==

Fails if the arguments are not specified correctly.

On success, returns if there was a collidable block in the specified direction.
